name: Guihai Chen
content: Homepage of Dr. Guihai CHEN Guihai obtained B. Science from Nanjing University, M. Engineering from Southeast University and  PhD in computer science from University of Hong Kong. He visited Kyushu Institute of Technology, Japan in 1998 as a research fellow. He also visited Stanford University, San Jose State University, Kyushu University, Wayne State University, University of Queensland, etc. He is now a full professor of Nanjing University and a guest professor of Wayne State University.
